angershell.name: Angershell
angershell.shortDesc: At half HP, the Pokémon lowers its Def and Sp. Def but sharply boosts its Atk, Sp. Atk, and Speed.
angershell.desc: At half HP, the Pokémon lowers its Def and Sp. Def but sharply boosts its Atk, Sp. Atk, and Speed.

armortail.shortDesc: The curious tail protects allies from opposing priority moves.
armortail.desc: The curious tail protects allies from opposing priority moves.

battlearmor.name: Battlearmor
battlearmor.desc: Protects the Pokemon from critical hits.

beadsofruin.name: Beadsofruin
beadsofruin.shortDesc: Lowers the Sp. Def of all opposing Pokémon.
beadsofruin.desc: Lowers the Sp. Def of all opposing Pokémon.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.desc: When HP is below 1/3, Fire-type moves have 1.5x power.

clearbody.name: Clearbody
clearbody.desc: Prevents other Pokemon from lowering this Pokemon's stats.

commander.name: Commander
commander.shortDesc: If this Pokémon's ally is Dondozo, it enters Dondozo's mouth to command it, boosting Dondozo instead of acting.
commander.desc: If this Pokémon's ally is Dondozo, it enters Dondozo's mouth to command it, boosting Dondozo instead of acting.

competitive.name: Competitive
competitive.desc: When a stat is lowered by an opponent, raises Sp. Attack by 2 stages.

costar.name: Costar
costar.shortDesc: Copies an ally's stat changes when the Pokémon enters battle.
costar.desc: Copies an ally's stat changes when the Pokémon enters battle.

cudchew.name: Cudchew
cudchew.shortDesc: After eating a Berry, the Pokémon will eat it again at the end of the next turn.
cudchew.desc: After eating a Berry, the Pokémon will eat it again at the end of the next turn.

defiant.name: Defiant
defiant.desc: When a stat is lowered by an opponent, raises Attack by 2 stages.

disguise.name: Disguise
disguise.desc: Blocks the first damaging move, taking 1/8 max HP as damage instead.

download.name: Download
download.desc: On switch-in, raises Attack or Sp. Attack by 1 stage based on opponent's lower defense.

drizzle.name: Drizzle
drizzle.desc: On switch-in, the weather becomes rainy for 5 turns.

drought.name: Drought
drought.desc: On switch-in, the weather becomes sunny for 5 turns.

dryskin.name: Dryskin
dryskin.desc: Heals 1/8 HP in rain, loses 1/8 HP in sun.

eartheater.desc: Restores HP if hit by a Ground-type move, instead of taking damage.

electromorphosis.desc: The Pokémon becomes charged when hit by an attack, boosting the power of its next Electric move.

flashfire.desc: Grants immunity to Fire-type moves. When hit by Fire moves, boosts Fire-type move power by 50%.

galewings.desc: At full HP, Flying-type moves have +1 priority.

grassysurge.desc: On switch-in, the terrain becomes Grassy Terrain for 5 turns.

guarddog.desc: Prevents being forced out, and its Attack is boosted if intimidated.

opportunist.desc: When an opposing Pokémon's stat is raised, the Pokémon copies the stat increase.
